page.title: 05Businesses in Dale
page.content: There are several Businesses.Dale Sailing Company is a commercial boatyard offering repair,slipping and launching,chartering,moorings, and storage services.The Company also run the pasenger service boat(The Dale Princess) to the offshore islands. Their main building houses a retail shop selling food,chandlery and clothing(especially sea-going gear) and gifts and sundries.They also run a snack-bar with take-away facilities. West Wales Windsurfing have a retail business,dealing in boards,wetsuits etc.The Post Office offers the usual sub-post-office services and is also a food and craft shop.There are two restaurants,the Post House and the Bistro;two small hotels,Eaton Hall and the Post House and one inn,the Griffin.There is also the Reading Room Gallery,with paintings for sale.
